name: RedCellDistributionWidth
title: Red Cell Distribution Width
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains laboratory observable Red Cell Distribution Width terms in blood.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to discover or request blood Red Cell Distribution Width levels in clinical records.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes laboratory LOINC encoded observable terms representing Red Cell Distribution Width terms in blood.),(Exclusion Criteria: Laboratory LOINC encoded terms that do not represent Red Cell Distribution Width terms in blood.)
